text:
Customer Support Engineer – Datacenter – Server Virtualization, DC Switching, Storage Area Networks

Multiple Locations: San Jose (CA), Raleigh (NC), Richardson (TX)

Now expanding the rockstar team! - Immediate full-time positions open for Data Center Switching, Server Virtualization and SAN engineers in Cisco Technical Services. Work on sizzling hot, game-changing technologies causing market disruptions..Interested! Apply Now
